mapper.select: SELECT A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_WRITER , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.BOARD_ENROLL_DATE , A.BOARD_END_DATE , A.MEMBER_NO FROM BB_BOARD A WHERE A.BOARD_TYPE = '공지' AND A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY A.BOARD_ENROLL_DATE DESC, A.BOARD_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BB_BOARD A ( A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.BOARD_BODY , A.BOARD_WRITER , A.BOARD_STATUS , A.BOARD_FILEATTACHMENT , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.BOARD_ENROLL_DATE , A.BOARD_END_DATE , A.MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL , #{title} , #{boardType} , #{body} , #{writer} , 'Y' , NULL , DEFAULT , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , 5 )
mapper.select: SELECT A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_WRITER , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.BOARD_ENROLL_DATE , A.BOARD_END_DATE , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.BOARD_STATUS , A.BOARD_BODY , A.MEMBER_NO FROM BB_BOARD A WHERE A.BOARD_TYPE = '공지' AND A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.BOARD_NO = #{no}
